package-flags.name: with-openssl
package-flags.description:
Include cryptograph hash functions from openssl. Requires that openssl
is installed in the system at a location where cabal can find it.

package-flags.name: benchmark-cryptonite
package-flags.description: Include implementations from the cryptonite package in benchmarks

package-flags.name: test-cryptonite
package-flags.description: Test compatibility with implementations of hash functions in cryptonite

package-flags.name: openssl-use-pkg-config
package-flags.description: Use pkg-config to find OpenSSL (macOS and linux only).
